column1: |产品名称|产品型号|功能描述|
|Japanese Epson RTC  module + Japanese Panasonic battery/capacitor|RX8130CE、RX8111CE、RX8900CE|集成 32.768kHz 石英晶体振荡器和实时时钟芯片，具有振荡电路、时钟功能、日历功能和报警功能，无需频率调整，开机后实时显示准确时间，实现精确计时和低功耗，适用于独立模式设备|

column3: I2C-Bus is a high-precision and high-stability  real-time clock chip  launched  to meet the special high-standard requirements of China Power Grid in smart grids.
I2C-Bus is a high-precision and high-stability  real-time clock chip  launched  to meet the special high-standard requirements of China Power Grid in smart grids.
